templates.title: PsiTransfer
templates.name: psitransfer
templates.description: PsiTransfer is a simple open source self-hosted file sharing solution. It's an alternative to paid services like Dropbox and WeTransfer. Features include no accounts or logins required, mobile friendly responsive interface, support for many and very big files with resumable uploads and downloads, expiring upload buckets, one-time downloads, password protected downloads, and admin dashboard.

env.name: PSITRANSFER_ADMIN_PASS
env.label: PSITRANSFER_ADMIN_PASS
env.description: Admin password for /admin page. Leave empty to disable admin page.

env.name: PSITRANSFER_UPLOAD_PASS
env.label: PSITRANSFER_UPLOAD_PASS
env.description: Password required for uploading files. Leave empty to allow public uploads.

env.name: PSITRANSFER_REQUIRE_BUCKET_PASSWORD
env.label: PSITRANSFER_REQUIRE_BUCKET_PASSWORD
env.description: Make the bucket password field mandatory.

env.name: PSITRANSFER_MAX_FILE_SIZE
env.label: PSITRANSFER_MAX_FILE_SIZE
env.description: Maximum file size in bytes. Leave empty for no limit.

env.name: PSITRANSFER_MAX_BUCKET_SIZE
env.label: PSITRANSFER_MAX_BUCKET_SIZE
env.description: Maximum bucket size in bytes. Leave empty for no limit.

env.name: PSITRANSFER_DEFAULT_RETENTION
env.label: PSITRANSFER_DEFAULT_RETENTION
env.description: Default retention time in seconds (604800 = 1 week).

env.name: PSITRANSFER_MAX_AGE
env.label: PSITRANSFER_MAX_AGE
env.description: Maximum age for files in seconds (6480000 = 75 days).
